text: Leo Anthony Gallagher, Jr. (July 24, 1946 - November 11, 2022), known mononymously as Gallagher, was an American comedian. He was best known for smashing watermelons as part of his prop comedy act. On November 11, 2022, Gallagher died of organ failure at age 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Comedians from Florida Category:Entertainers from Tampa, Florida
title: Gallagher
